summary: This American TV show is about a special agency called S.H.I.E.L.D. that deals with superheroes and spies. It's set in the same world as the Marvel movies and has some of the same actors. The agents fight bad guys like Hydra and aliens, and sometimes team up with heroes from the movies. The show started in 2013 and ran for 7 seasons, with lots of exciting adventures and special effects. Even though the ratings went down, fans loved it, and some characters even appeared in Marvel comics later.
title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
